Package org.letras.psi.ipen

Interface Summary
IPen This interface defines the methods provided by each pen as part of the interface between the raw data and the region processing stages.
IPenState This interface specifies constants used as flags to determine a pen's state.
 

Class Summary
DoIPen Automatically generated distributed object class for IPen.
MetaPenEvent  
MetaPenSample  
PenEvent Wrapper class for pen state changes.
PenSample This class encapsulates all information transferred as part of a raw data sample.
SrvIPen Automatically generated server stub for IPen
